channel.title: Help with my client, can be a mod on my server if you help
channel.description: I need help with my client, i want to do a jar or exe file of my client files but i have no luck with it. The person who can help me with that can be a mod on my server.

item.title: Help with my client, can be a mod on my server if you help
item.dc:creator: @P_A_N_I_C P A N I C
item.description:
@P_A_N_I_C wrote:

Zanzibar:

How to make a jar file

Read full topic

item.title: Help with my client, can be a mod on my server if you help
item.dc:creator: @iFuze iFuze
item.description:
@iFuze wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:9, topic:392541”]If you cannot create a jar, how can you program a server? I am sorry if I sound mean, but this is just common knowledge…

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,478495.0.html[/quote]

Ok, what do i put as main class?

My run server looks like this:

@echo off
Title Steady-Pwn Client V.0.1_2
start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui
exit

Read full topic
item.source: Help with my client, can be a mod on my server if you help

item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

If you cannot create a jar, how can you program a server? I am sorry if I sound mean, but this is just common knowledge…

programming, irc, cars

item.title: Help with my client, can be a mod on my server if you help
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“iFuze, post:6, topic:392541”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=489712.msg3580304#msg3580304 date=1303751520]

How to make a jar file

Try that, am looking for a person who can do this for me.

No self-respecting member of this community will do anything for you. If you won’t make the effort, why the hell should we?
[/quote]

Well, am going to grab my gun and shot me in the head, becouse i belived in there is some nice poeple out there in the world who could help me with this.[/quote]

I doubt you tried even once.

jar -cvf

Read full topic

item.title: Help with my client, can be a mod on my server if you help
item.dc:creator: @Zanzibar Zanzibar
item.description:
@Zanzibar wrote:

Well I believe this isn’t a spoon-feeding community and you will learn nothing if someone does it for you, so keep on trying and post your errors along the way and we’ll probably give hints to help you.

Read full topic
